algorithm_technique: Iterate through triplets, keeping track of maximums that don't exceed target components.
problem_summary_simple: Can we combine triplets to match a target triplet by taking maximums?
problem_summary_technical: Check if target components can be formed by element-wise max of valid triplets.
key_insights: A triplet can only contribute to the target if all its elements are less than or equal to the corresponding target elements.
The operation is essentially finding if we can 'grow' a triplet to match the target by taking maximums.
We only need to track the maximum achievable values for each component of the target.
